alert.note: Alert for Ripley (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 10:40AM CST until February 20 at 5:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Current River near Doniphan affecting Ripley County. .Heavy rainfall that occurred Thursday continues to cause rises on the Current River. The river is forecast to go above flood stage at Doniphan today, crest this evening, then fall back below flood stage overnight. For the Current River...including Doniphan...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Current River near Doniphan. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Saturday the stage was 12.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 13.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
